places_with_reviews.name: BAPS Shri Swaminarayan Mandir
places_with_reviews.address: NH 8, Satyam Twp, Zadeshwar, Bharuch, Gujarat 392011, India

reviews.text: Swaminarayan Baps temple in Bharuch was a calming place, surrounded by peaceful scenery and spacious gardens that brought immense calmness. The architecture was truly remarkable, and the uplifting atmosphere made the visit truly unforgettable. It was definitely a highlight of my time in Bharuch.

This temple is located right beside the highway. Very calm and peaceful. Not that crowded when compared to other temples. Beautiful architecture like all other temples. Closes at 8pm. There is also a dining room inside.
It's a nice place to pray and a peaceful place The mood is automatically changed when you visit this place.

This is very beautiful temple with beautiful architecture.The temple have with some stunning carved pillars, magificent architecture and delightful idols. It is one of the significant attraction for visitors to Bharuch.There's lot of space available for parking to all type of vehicles.Very well maintained and beautiful garden.You enter the temple and you can feel the positive vibes.A complete temple where you can pray,stay,learn,pratice all the teachings.The area cool air and pleasant atmosphere.Best place to demonstrate your stress.
beutiful and divine place with larger outer garden area where you can sit and enjoy the evening while taking blessings

places_with_reviews.name: Shirdi Sai Baba Temple
places_with_reviews.address: P29H+3XG, Ramvatika Society, Zadeshwar, Bharuch, Gujarat 392012, India

reviews.text:
Divine place. Do make online booking
For Darshan and rooms. We stayed in Sai Bhakta Niwas. The rooms were neat and clean. Also the rooms are available from any time you  choose up-to 11 am and also the cost is very affordable.

A really good and peaceful place for worshipping God. The track around the dried lake is amazing for walking and jogging in the morning and the evening. I go there everyday and thought I could review it. Even if you are not going there to worship but you can walk around the lake. Peace and spiritual and beautiful!!

Sitting arrangement made around temple is in very large numbers...  Also have round track nearby to walk, run...
But need to improve lighting in walk area..  Location is best to spend time.

A devine place for sai baba followers. Sradha saburi. A nearby walk round available for morning and evening walk. A very peacefull place for spare your free hours. Benches available for sitting.   In the evening time is best for group meeting and share your thoughts. A near by library available for reading books.

Hi Guys,
I love the vibe of temple. This temple is so beautiful and we'll maintained.this place is so peaceful. There is seating arrangement outside side the temple. People do gossips there. One  more thing,There is a running track besides the temple, people usually go for a walk and run there. Only thing that I don't like is there isn't a Prasad's Shop.

places_with_reviews.name: Nilkantheshwar Temple
places_with_reviews.address: P29W+R76, Zadeshwar Rd, Ganesh Shrishti, Vadadla, Bharuch, Gujarat 392011, India

reviews.text:
A nice calm place. An ancient temple on the banks of river Narmada. Surrounded by lushness, there are 3 temples, the central temple of Nilkanteshwar Mahadev, a Hanuman temple right opposite that. And another Shiva temple a few steps ahead from there. And one can go to the banks of the river.

Evenings are beautiful and scenic with nice views of sunset and the new cable stayed bridge.

A nice place for some quality calm family time.

Arti time is must visit. Premises Close at 8:30. Post arti

Neelkanth Mahadev Mandir in Bharuch is a revered Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Shiva, attracting devotees and tourists alike with its spiritual ambiance and architectural grandeur. The temple's location on the banks of the Narmada River adds to its scenic beauty, providing a serene and tranquil environment for visitors seeking solace and divine blessings.

The temple's architecture is a blend of traditional Gujarati and Rajasthani styles, characterized by intricate carvings, colorful motifs, and majestic domes. The sanctum sanctorum houses a magnificent idol of Lord Shiva, attracting devotees who come to offer prayers and seek blessings. The temple complex also includes other shrines dedicated to various deities, contributing to its religious significance.

Apart from its religious importance, Neelkanth Mahadev Mandir is also a popular tourist attraction due to its historical and cultural significance. Visitors can explore the temple complex, witness traditional rituals and ceremonies, and soak in the spiritual atmosphere that pervades the surroundings. Overall, Neelkanth Mahadev Mandir in Bharuch is a must-visit destination for those interested in spirituality, history, and architectural marvels.

Neelkantheshwar Mahadev’s temple situated on the banks of river Narmada is center of attraction (devotion ) for people living in Bharuch. All wall of temple is decorated with small shivling which is very nice. Many monkeys in the temple.

Very scenic temple at Narmada river bank.
100 people can sit easily at a nearby temple. The river bank is very near.
Temple walls have hundreds of shivlingas.
You can witness evening Aarti at 6Pm.
There are many rooms near the Temple for People doing Narmada Parikrama.

Nilkanth Mahadev temple is the heart of Bharuch city. One of the oldest temples. Narmada river is next to the mandir.

A very calm and clear atmosphere is around. Hanuman temple is also in the mandir area.

places_with_reviews.name: Narmada bridge
places_with_reviews.address: Narmada River Rd, P27V+QW5, NH 48, Gujarat 392011, India

reviews.text: Very nice moments during sunrise at Narmada bridge.... Proud feel..... Just cleaning required..... At walking path.... I requested to all citizens that try to avoid throw unwanted material like polythene etc. i suggested that 4 and 5 dustbin drum kept at the walking path area.

🌉  A Majestic Marvel Connecting Cultures! 🌉

Situated in the heart of Ankleshwar, the Narmada Bridge is a symbol of architectural grandeur and a vital link uniting communities. 🌐

🚗 Ease of Commute:
The bridge serves as a crucial transportation route, facilitating smooth connectivity between the regions on either side of the Narmada River. Its strategic location makes it a lifeline for commuters, ensuring efficient travel. 🚗🌁

🌊 River Panorama:
As you traverse the bridge, you're treated to a breathtaking panorama of the Narmada River. The flowing waters beneath create a serene and picturesque view, especially during sunrise and sunset. 🌅🌊

🌆 Cityscape Views:
From the vantage point of the bridge, the cityscape unfolds in all its glory. The bustling city of Ankleshwar, with its blend of modernity and tradition, stretches out on both sides, offering a dynamic visual spectacle. 🏙️🌆

🌉 Architectural Charm:
The architecture of the Narmada Bridge is both functional and aesthetically pleasing. The sturdy design ensures the seamless flow of vehicular traffic, while the graceful arches and railings add an element of elegance to the structure. 🏗️🌈

🌳 Scenic Surroundings:
Surrounded by lush greenery on the banks, the bridge provides a refreshing and calming environment. The well-maintained flora enhances the overall ambiance, making it an inviting space for a leisurely stroll or a peaceful moment of reflection. 🍃🌳

🌇 Sunset Spectacle:
The Narmada Bridge transforms into a canvas of colors during sunset. The hues of orange, pink, and purple paint the sky, creating a mesmerizing backdrop against the silhouette of the bridge. It's a sight that captivates locals and visitors alike. 🌅🎨

👣 Pedestrian Path:
For those seeking a closer experience with the surroundings, the bridge offers a pedestrian path. Walking across allows individuals to absorb the beauty at a leisurely pace, fostering a deeper connection with the scenic expanse. 🚶‍♂️🚶‍♀️

🌟 Night Illumination:
As night falls, the Narmada Bridge is gracefully illuminated, casting a radiant glow. The play of lights not only enhances its visual appeal but also contributes to the city's vibrant nightscape. 💫✨

In essence, the Narmada Bridge is more than a means of transport; it's a cultural conduit and a visual delight that harmoniously blends functionality with aesthetics. Whether for a daily commute or a leisurely evening stroll, the bridge stands as a testament to Ankleshwar's progress and unity. 🌉🤝🌍

#NarmadaBridge #Ankleshwar #CulturalHeritage #ArchitecturalMarvel #CityscapeView
Beutiful view visit at 7:34 pm under the cable bridge and enjoy the sound of Narmada river and capturing pictures
It's a very good view' of bridge on Bank of narmda river

Bridge is newly built up for one way connecting Bharuch Toll Tax to Bharuch city.
Many years expensed behind its built up.
Before there was too much traffic
And it was believed as the highest traffic area on Bombay-Ahmedabad national highway
Due to this bridge traffic problem has been rectified automatically upto maxmum level.
And therefore one can cross this way easily within less time.
Its road is very nice because no bumpy at all.
At night whole bridge is lightened with colorful lights.
It has become the place of attraction and visit for public.
Bridge is too much clean.

places_with_reviews.name: Narmada Park
places_with_reviews.address: P29V+QMQ, Sardar Bridge, Ganesh Shrishti, Vadadla, Bharuch, Gujarat 392011, India

reviews.text:
This park is now closed from 1st Feb, 2024.
Don't know until when.

Good park for kidz, In monsoon full park cover with greeney looking more osm.
You can see the beauty of Narmada River. Park having one small play area for kidz up to 10year. Sliders are their may be taken from some old Water Park.

Nothing special here for now. As the way to river is blocked currently. A lot of couples were there. Sometimes its a little uncomfortable. Other than that it was okay. Good for kids. Playground is also good. Ample parking space. Entry fee is currently 10 per person. Parking is free

Good Park to go with children
Free parking
Entry fees 10 rs for 7years above all
Timing until 8 in the evening
Needs public awareness for housekeeping and cleanliness
Play area is good but many rides needs maintenance
There is one small waste water trench going , needs proper safety on that bridge.
Security is keeping an eye on everything.
Park needs proper maintenance.

Narmada Park is a good place to visit during early morning or during sunset. Park is situated on the bank of river Narmada. Garden also have small adventure section for kids. You can visit this place with family or friends. You will get to see a mesmerizing view of wire bridge. Besides park there is also Nilkantheshwar Temple. Boating facilities are available on river bank with nominal charges. Only thing I felt bothered was safety at the bank, as it is completely open to river. Overall I had a good experience, hope same for others.
